snippet: Congress should make it easier for people to challenge their inclusion on the list.
abstract: Editorial contends suit filed by Dr Rahinah Ibrahim, who was mistakenly put on no-fly list and not allowed back into the United States, against US government offers a window in vast and secret world of terrorism watch lists; call on Congress to make it easier for people to challenge their inclusion on a watch list and force the government to either defend its decision or correct error.
lead_paragraph: Congress should make it easier for people to challenge their inclusion on the list.

headline.main: The Black Hole of Terrorism Watch Lists
headline.print_headline: The Black Hole of Terrorism Watch Lists
